doc: Fix typos in COPYRIGHT

Fixed a couple of typos

events.body: ACK. Correct name is indeed "Stephen Hutchings"

> Correct name is indeed "Stephen Hutchings"

Has he an account on the GutHub?

>ACK. Correct name is indeed "Stephen Hutchings"

I was looking for conclusive source on this but couldn't find it

<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#16612](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/16612.html) (qt: Remove menu icons by laanwj)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.

ACK 36f7697cf6c129cabff2a698a52115829cd0d1fb, correct name is already here:

https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/f418c3379cbad8caaf3e988caf727fe62b218f8c/contrib/debian/copyright#L51

All occurrences are now correct.
